thread.section_title: Hotel ibis Styles Paris Tolbiac Bibliotheque - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value - Review
thread.title_full: Good value - Review of Hotel ibis Styles Paris Tolbiac Bibliotheque, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mrenard1953
title: Good value - Review
text:
Pretty central, with easy access to bus, rail and Metro links. There are also a few nice restaurants nearby. This is a busy budget hotel and slightly worn, BUT :
- It is clean
- it has (expensive) parking
- the management and staff are VERY friendly and helpful
- The continental breakfasts are excellent!
Recommended!
Room Tip: The higher floors are quieter See more room tips
